attributes.action: Stop sending money to EU countries by our tax money.
attributes.additional_details:
It's about time our government thought of our own country first, and stop handing our tax payers out to other countries in the EU.

When our own people are suffering in this country the UK.

It's time to make a stand now and our money is not to be sent to EU countries no longer.

When we have starving people in our own country and dieing. Has we cannot afford to live.
